metadata.title: CVE-2021-4323 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Extensions in Google Chromeprior to 90.0.4430.72 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to access local files via a crafted Chrome Extension.(Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
